Orientations_dictionary.d_help: Default Dip: field that contains dip information.
Orientations_dictionary.dd_help: Dip Direction: field that contains dip direction information.
Orientations_dictionary.sf_help: Feature: field that contains information on type of structure.
Orientations_dictionary.bo_help: Dip Diection type: field that contains type of foliation.
Orientations_dictionary.otype_help: Dip Direction Convention*: flag to determine measurement convention (currently <strike> or <dip direction>).
Orientations_dictionary.bedding_help: Bedding flag: text to search for in field defined by sf code to show that this is a bedding measurement.
Orientations_dictionary.btype_help: Overturned flag: text to search for in field defined by bo code to show that this is an overturned bedding measurement.

ids_dictionary.gi_help: Point ID: object id for structures.

Fault_and_folds.fault_help: Fault flag: text to search for in field defined by f code to show that this is a fault
Fault_and_folds.dipest_vals_help: Fdipest flag: text to search for in field defined by fdipest to give fault dip estimate in increasing steepness
Fault_and_folds.fdip_help: Default Dip*: field for numeric fault dip value.
Fault_and_folds.fdipdir_help: Dip Direction*: field for text fault dip direction value.
Fault_and_folds.ff_help: Feature*: field that contains information on type of structure.
Fault_and_folds.fdipest_help: Fdipest: field for text fault dip estimate value.

stratigraphy_dictionary.c_help: Formation*: field that contains finer stratigraphic coding.
stratigraphy_dictionary.g_help: Group: field that contains coarser stratigraphic coding.
stratigraphy_dictionary.g2_help: Supergroup: field that contains alternate coarser stratigraphic coding if <g> is blank.
stratigraphy_dictionary.ds_help: Description: field that contains information about lithology.
stratigraphy_dictionary.u_help: FM code: field that contains alternate stratigraphic coding.
stratigraphy_dictionary.r1_help: Rocktype 1: field that contains extra lithology information.
stratigraphy_dictionary.r2_help: Rocktype 1: field that contains even more lithology information.
stratigraphy_dictionary.sill_help: Sill: text to search for in field defined by ds code to show that this is a sill.
stratigraphy_dictionary.intrusive_help: Intrusion: text to search for in field defined by r1 code to show that this is an intrusion.
stratigraphy_dictionary.volcanic_help: text to search for in field defined by ds code to show that this is a volcanic (not intrusion).

timing.min_help: Min Age: field that contains minimum age of unit defined by ccode.
timing.max_help: Max Age: field that contains maximum age of unit defined by ccode.

geology_params.pluton_dip_help: pluton_dip (int)[45]: In degrees: default pluton contact dip.
geology_params.pluton_form_help: pluton_form(str)['domes']: Possible forms from domes, saucers or pendant.
geology_params.intrusion_mode_help: intrusion_mode(int): [1] to exclude all intrusions from basal contacts, [0] to only exclude sills.
geology_params.max_thick_allowd_help: max_thickness_allowed(int)[10000]: When estimating local formation thickness in metres.
geology_params.thickness_buffer_help: thickness_buffer(int)[5000]: In metres: How far away to look for next highest unit when calculating formation thickness.
geology_params.contact_decimate_help: contact_decimate(int)[5]: Save every nth contact data point. 0 means save all data.
geology_params.contact_dip_help: contact_dip(int)[-999]: In degrees: Dip to assign to all new basal contact orientations. If -999 then the nearest interpolated dip for that supergroup will be used instead.
geology_params.ctct_ori_decimat_help: contact_orientation_decimate(int)[5]: Save every nth contact orientation point. 0 means save all data.
geology_params.misorientation_help: misorientation(int)[30]: Maximum misorientation in pole to great circle of bedding between groups to be considered part of same supergroup.

fault_params.fault_decimate_help: Save every nth fault data point along fault trace. 0 means save all data. [5]
fault_params.min_fault_length_help: Minimum fault length in meters to be considered. [5000]

struct_params.misorientation_help: Maximum misorientation in pole to great circle of bedding between groups to be considered part of same supergroup (int) [30]
struct_params.ori_decimate_help: Save every nth orientation data point. 0 means save all data. (int) [0]
